con:restRequest.name: AddSurvey
con:restRequest.con:request: { "SurveyDescription": "Survey${=new java.text.SimpleDateFormat("yyyyMMddHHmmssSSS").format(new Date())}", "SurveyCode": "${ChkIfSurveyExist#surveycode}", "SurveyTypeId": "${GetSurveyType#Response#$[0]['SurveyTypeId']}", "CategoryId": "${GetSurveyCategory#Response#$[0]['CategoryId']}", "IsDefaultSurvey": "false", "DisplayCorrectInd": false, "DisplayCorrectAnswerInd": false, "SurveyClassId": "${GetStdSurveyClassId#QuizSurveyClass}", "DisplayScoreInd": false, "SurveyStartDate": "${=new java.text.SimpleDateFormat("yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ssZ").format(new Date()+4)}", "SurveyEndDate": "${=new java.text.SimpleDateFormat("yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ssZ").format(new Date()+15)}", "SurveyTimeZone": "UTC", "IntroductoryCaption": "${SurveyMoment#IntroductoryCaption}", "CompletionMessage": "${SurveyMoment#CompletionMessage}" }

con:restRequest.name: BuildSurvey

con:property.con:name: CreateBody
UpdateBody
